patches.value: I am a developer and SDLC-specialist compelled to apply my 10+ years experience to solving problems for fellow musicians. With a comprehensive eye for efficiency and constant imrpovement, I intend to go all-in with my broad creative approach and talent for undertaking complex projects. Balancing strong communication with business awareness and an unyeidling commitment to paying down technical debt, I am a key long-term advocate for teams I serve. Embodying both an insatiable independent drive and a patience to teach and encourage others, I want to make a big impact with my code contributions while inspiring my collaborators to confidently produce and deliver high-quality software essential to today's musicians.
